tasks.task: Attend EESI's briefing on Regenerative Agriculture 21st-Century Farm Policy.
subtasks: Listen to Senator John Tester discuss regenerative agriculture's importance.
Learn about regenerative agriculture practices and principles from Dr. Arohi Sharma.
Understand indigenous perspectives on regenerative agriculture from Michael Kutatwa Johnson.
Examine federal policy recommendations for supporting regenerative agriculture from Christopher Reynolds.
Explore the challenges and success of regenerative agriculture in ranching from Brittany Masters.
Respond to Q&A on scaling regenerative agriculture and federal policy support.
Consider the role of cover crops, no-till, and crop diversification in regenerative practices.
